channel.title: Making It With Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto
channel.description: Making It is a weekly audio podcast that comes out every Friday hosted by Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto. Three different makers with different backgrounds talking about creativity, design and making things with your bare hands.

image.title: Making It With Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto

item.description: This week Jimmy Diresta, Bob Clagett and David Picciuto talk about things they need to get better at. What We’re Working On Jimmy Diresta Finished the big machinists toolbox David...
